channel.title: Need some help for me friend?
channel.description:
well my friends dad died yesterday in a plane crash =\ he is my neighbor and i have known him since i was like 3. i knew is dad pretty good and i feel like i should make something.. but my skills or not so good so i am asking someone else to make it. i would prefer you use this picture:
http://a345.ac-images.myspacecdn.com/images01/99/l_e2713dc2a9868aa1153cdf54aac5f098.jpg
and also make it kind of plain... and if you use any colors try to use black and blue or black and white =\

item.title: Need some help for me friend?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

exe626:

Snaps, I got quoted. Anyway, is that a picture of his dad? Also, what exactly did you want made, you threw a picture at us and said use black/white/blue.

ok on june 10, 2007 my friends dad died in a airplane crash due to smoke in the cockpit. I wanted to make something for him. Yes it is a picture of his dad. What i want is a simple sig with those colors in it and that picture. Ill figure out what wording i wont on it later and i might just add my own wording to it. If your going to help pm me about it and ill give you more detail on what you want to know.

Read full topic
